detail.description: Founded in 1986 as M/s Gujarat Industries, the company was incorporated in 1995 as Meghmani Organics Limited. The company manufactures Pigments and Agrochemicals through its 6 manufacturing facilities located in Gujarat. The company is amongst the top 3 Phthalocyanine based pigment players in the world and amongst the top 10 producers of pesticides in India.[1]Meghmani Organics Ltd (MOL) manufactures green and blue pigment products, which are used to manufacture printing ink, plastic, paints, textiles, leather, and rubber. It also manufactures a wide variety of commonly used pesticides for crop and non-crop applications, this include insect control in wood preservation and food grain storage.
